trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Blythe
There were no other sightings in Blythe on or around April 19th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsOn April 19,2013 ,I was out side in my front yard enjoying the night sky with my dogs.It was about 8:50pm it was time for us to go inside, as i was about to put the dogs back in the house. I noticed a bright flaming light bigger than the stars. it appeared in the east side of the sky, i then quickly ran inside to get my iPhone to video tape it. when i got back the object was going NE direction, i videoed the object till it was just out of sight. This was not a falling star this object had direction.
Summary: Bright flamming red light ,comming from eastern skys and moving towards NE
